EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q416.Reminder - Cincinnati 11-9-16
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud-Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Cincinnati. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow—Cincinnati, OH Thursday, November 10, 2016 8:00am – 9:00am Breakfast 9:00am – 9:30am The Cloud-Native Advantage 9:30am – 11:30pm The Promises of a Cloud-Native Platform 11:30am – 12:30pm Lunch 12:30pm – 1:00pm The Value Moves Up the Stack 1:00pm – 2:45pm Architecting the Cloud-Native Application 2:45pm – 3:00pm Wrap-up Roadshow Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/cincinnati]]>
Location: Cintrifuse <[[http://www.cintrifuse.com/]]> 1311 Vine Street, Cincinnati, OH 45202 Map & Directions <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Cintrifuse/@39.1098441,-84.5176433,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x8841b15bd13720d9:0xe218d74378c9e9f1!8m2!3d39.10984!4d-84.51546]]>
Parking information: Mercer Garage
Questions? Contact Jason Lee at (415) 300-7595 or email jalee@pivotal.io <[[mailto:jalee@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
